home.name: Home

baseline.h1: Manage your e-mails like a boss
baseline.h5: Create hundreds of e-mail aliases to prevent spam

e_mails_on_the_fly.p: With Randomail, you can create hundreds of e-mails. Create a new alias when you sign-up on a website. There is a Google Chrome extension for that. It prevent you from identity leaks and it works perfect with Lastpass or 1Password.

on_your_mailbox.p: When you receive a new e-mail on a Randomail alias, this e-mail is forwarded to your real mailbox (Gmail, Hotmail, etc). You can reply to e-mails using Randomail aliases.

manage_it.p: You can manage your own domain name to make aliases like me@myname.com. You can use advanced filters, use PGP. You can even automatically forward it to your wife!

home.demo: Randomail can help you everywhere you need it. Generate a Randomail alias everytime a merchant store asks for your e-mail address!

the_best.h5: (If you find a better one, tell us)

posts.name: What is an alias?
posts.content: An randomail alias is a fake mailbox where people can send e-mails to it. Theses e-mails are then forwarded to your real mailbox.

posts.name: Why premium?
posts.content: Randomail is a small service: we need money to keep the service online. We are students too, so we need to live ;)

posts.name: I lost my password
posts.content: Just click 'Forgot your password' on the dashboard

link.name: Here is the link to recover it.

posts.name: How to stop messages on a Randomail alias
posts.content: Go to your dashboard and click on the alias. A menu will appears. Just click on pause, and then, you will not receive messages on this alias.

posts.name: How to have a custom domain name?
posts.content:
You need to upgrade to a premium account. Then, go to your dashboard in the settings menu (on the left), in the domains settings to add the new domain.
When domain is added, you have to update settings on your DNS provider to link your domain with our servers.
If you have any questions, feel free to contact the support.

posts.name: How to send anonymous messages? (upcoming feature)
posts.content:
You need to upgrade to a Premium account. You can then use your webmail (Gmail), or Thunderbird to send e-mails via our SMTP servers
If you have any questions, feel free to contact the support.

posts.name: How to forward mails to multiple mailboxes?
posts.content: You have to go to your dashboard, then in the settings menu (on the left), to the 'accounts' tab

posts.name: My question is not in the list

about_us.name: About Us
about_us.description: Built in 2012, Randomail is now in it's third version with more 8000 active users and 6 millions e-mails forwarded

founders.name: Baptiste Jamin
founders.description: French student in engineering school, I'm 21 years old. I'm a freelancer too. I started working on Randomail when I was 18. I'm the developer and administrator of the platform.

founders.name: Hugo Mroczkowsi
founders.description: I'm 18 years old. And I'm now located in the north of France, in Lille. I'm student in an engineering school too. I started working on Randomail when I was 16.
J'ai 18 ans. Je suis maintenant à Lille et je suis égalmenent étudiant en école d'ingénieur. J'ai commencé Randomail à 16 ans.

posts.name: E-mail
posts.content:
At Randomail, we are nice guys and we reply!
Feel free to contact us at contact@randomail.net and you need some support or if you want to give us some feedbacks, or just to say hello.

posts.name: Twitter
posts.content: We are on twitter to. Just tweet at @randomailnet.

posts.name: IRL
posts.content: We like to meet our users! Check us on Twitter @baptistejamin & @hugo_mro

terms.name: Terms & Conditions
terms.disclaimer: Attention! Only the french version of our terms is official.
terms.intro: Randomail.net is a personnal website proposing free e-mail redirections. If you use our 'services' you must agree to the following terms and the french law. We can change these terms at every moment. On each modification, an e-mail is normally sent to each user. If the user does not accept the new conditions, he must delete his account on Randomail.net . User can obtain communication and, if necessary, correction or deletion of information about it. These changes can be made from the dashboard.
terms: By Signing Up, user must give us a valid e-mail address.
It is strictly forbidden to use our 'services' for terrorism, pedophilia, violence, racial hatred, threats, hacking, xenophobia, fraud and spam usage.
We disclaim any responsibility if your account is hacked. In addition, the user undertakes to use a complex password.
You must use our 'services' with fair use.
Only one account per person is allowed.
User accept that some data can be use for statistical purpose and maintenance.
In addition, user must understand that some datas posted the dashboard on the website can be stored for a good operation .
Limitations: Randomail.net and / or its founders has / have no obligation of result.
User agrees not to sue Randomail.net and / or one of its founders in case of default or non-delivery and in case of hacking.
On his part, Randomail.net agree to provide quality service and to not transmit datas to third parties, execept for justice. Saves are normally done automatically.
terms.cancellation: User can delete his account at any moment by connecting to the dashboard, in 'settings' tab. Then, some data are moved into a dedicated database for three month. These data can only be use for judicature usage. Three month after resiltiation, these datas are deleted. These measures are done to prevent from personal datas corrupting. Some datas like the owner's email address and the label are deleted three month after deletion. In case of abuse, Randomail.net can delete an account and/or redirections without any notice and the user agrees not to sue Randomail.net and / or one of its founders in this case.
collected_data: Randomail.net stores your IP address and your e-mail address. Randomail.net can store some cookies  to keep users connected. Google Analytics can store some cookie  for anonymous statistics purposes.
Logs are stored for six month. Theses data can be used the judicature usage.

E-mails are processed by our system and sent to each receiver. Some data like the sender e-mail address and the receiver e-mail address can be stored for judicature usage. We don't store messages and attachments.
pricacy: Randomail.net doesn't yields personal datas to third parties, exept judicature.
data_deletion: User can obtain communication and, if necessary, correction or deletion of information about it. These changes can be made from the dashboard.

footer.description: Created in 2012, Randomail is today on it's third version with more than 8000 users and 6 millions e-mails forwarded. We are a small service and close from our users. If you have any question, problem or feedback, you can contact us at contact@randomail.net or via twitter @randomailnet
